content.description:
Starting from a spacious ledge, climb past two bolts on a low-angled slab and then run it out a bit on easier ground to a bolted anchor/rap station (shared with Music To My Smears) where the angle starts to kick back.

Mellow slab climbing in a fairly secluded, out of the way locale. One star out of five maybe.
content.location:
Located on the south side of

Skirt

just right of

Music to My Smears

and about 100' left of Boom Boom Room.

content.description:
Fun climbing on dark brown patina plates with the odd balance move is what you'll find on this well-hidden route that's worth seeking out for it's enjoyable movement as well as it's peculiar name.

Well protected, and in a sheltered location that makes it ideal for those cold and windy days frequent to Josh. Three stars out of five.
content.location:
Located in a north-south running corridor between the skirt and the pommel of Saddle Rocks.

Walk left from the base of Boom Boom Room/

Nuts and Bolts

to access the corridor where you'll find this east-facing route, just to the right of the obscure Sullivan from Colorado (5.9 R).

content.description: Starts off a large ledge and climbs a well-protected friction slab past three bolts to a shared anchor/rap with Presto In C Sharp.
content.location:
Located on the south side of

Skirt

just left of

Presto in C Sharp

and about 100' left of Boom Boom Room.
